thread.title: No one inside blazing building
thread.title_full: No one inside blazing building | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: No one inside blazing building
text:
Avon Fire and Rescue say they don't believe anyone's been hurt in a huge fire in the centre of Bristol. The blaze ripped through student accommodation on Colston Street.
Two turntable ladders are being used to tackle a fire in student accomodation.
More than 40 firefighters are on the scene, with the fire now contained to the fifth floor and roof space.
At this time it's thought that no one was inside and there are no reports of any injuries.
â€“ Avon Fire & Rescue Last updated Tue 13 Oct 2015 Read more 8 updates Huge blaze in Bristol centre Travel Bristol
